info.title: Events
info.description: 1st Global Events Hub that aggregates the best events worldwide. More than 70 ticketing sites, + Eventbrite, Meetup, Eventful, Facebook and Wordpress. Robby cross a wide scale of categories: Sporting events, Concert, Festivals, Art Expo, Museum, Theatre plays, Business, Meetings or Fooding happenings.

get.description: Search events with a simple text, a city name and a country code

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Name of the city where the event happens (UTF-8 Format)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: 2 chars code of the country where the event happens (ISO3166 Format)

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Distance in Kilometers from the  lat/lng point where the event happens (required "lat" and "lon")

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From date , by default today (RFC3339 Format, optional +/- Timezone at the end)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude in degrees where the event happens (required "lng" and "distance")

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of answer (100 maximum)

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude in degrees where the event happens (required "lat" and "distance")

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Name of the event, performer, tags, venue or category

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To date, by default one week after date from (RFC3339 Format, optional +/- Timezone at the end)
